instructions

mouse

mousemove while up:
pencil
mousemove while down:
pen
click to:
roll dice

keys

esc key:
ui reset
q key:
model reset
left arrow:
increases interaction_character_clientX
right arrow:
decreases interaction_character_clientX
up arrow:
increases interaction_character_clientY
down arrow:
decreases interaction_character_clientY
w key:
increases vr x-axis
a key:
decreases vr x-axis
s key:
increases vr y-axis
d key:
decreases vr y-axis
